text: Ni na We waremye ibirere n'isi mu minsi itandatu, kandi Ar’shi ye yari hejuru y’amazi; (ibyo byose yabikoze) kugira ngo abagerageze (bityo agaragaze) muri mwe urusha abandi ibikorwa byiza. Ariko uramutse ubabwiye uti “Mu by’ukuri muzazurwa nyuma yo gupfa”, ba bandi bahakanye bavuga bati “Iyi (Qur’an) nta kindi iri cyo uretse ko ari uburozi bugaragara.”
